snippet: The attack on a church in Kenya’s capital, Nairobi, came two days after Kenyan forces invaded the last major stronghold of the Shabab militant group in Somalia.
abstract: Grenade attack on church in Nairobi, Kenya, kills 9-year-old boy and injures several other children two days after Kenyan forces invaded last major stronghold of the Shabab militant group in Somalia; suspicion immediately focuses on sympathizers of the Shabab.

byline.contributor: Reuben Kyama contributed reporting from Nairobi, Kenya.

lead_paragraph: The attack on a church in Kenya’s capital, Nairobi, came two days after Kenyan forces invaded the last major stronghold of the Shabab militant group in Somalia.

headline.main: As Kenyan Forces Press Militants Across Border, a Church Is Attacked Back Home
headline.print_headline: As Kenyan Forces Press Militants Across Border, a Church Is Attacked Back Home
